title: Bug 109718: Text item tips show large content in one line
description:
INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: Tips should be shown in the given format
Actual Result: Tips are shown in one line
OB: When a large content is placed in a text item, the tips for the text item are displayed in a single line
EB: The tips for the text item should be displayed in the given format, regardless of the size of the content
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Insert a text in the layout
2. Input 'Contents'
3. Save and put the mouse on the text item
